thread.title: Marie Nelson
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Marie Nelson

author: Marie Nelson
title: Marie Nelson
text: We brought our tire to have it changed out from a very minor accident. We thought that we needed a new tire, but come to find out, it had only popped the bead, and the actual tire was not punctured. Chris was very professional, and a great help to us. we appreciated his honesty.
